title: PMS 2.0 338 - AFC/NFC Championship Preview, Tom Telesco, Michael Lombardi, Ariel Helwani, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys look ahead at all of the storylines from this weekend's AFC and NFC Championship games, and give their predictions, and betting leans for the big game, chat some more about Motor City Dan Campbell, and look ahead to this weekend's UFC fights. Also joining the show is General Manager of the LA Chargers, Tom Telesco, to chat about drafting Justin Herbert, the hiring process for selecting their Head Coach, how not having a combine is going to change his job this year, and what he's eventually going to have to pay Justin Herbert (20:46-42:47). Next, 3x Super Bowl Champion, former GM of the Cleveland Browns, host of the GM Shuffle podcast and cohost of HammerDAHN, Michael Lombardi joins the show to chat about this weekend's Championship games, and the hiring process in the NFL, and who he expects to end up where (44:19-56:46). Later, ESPN MMA Insider, Bills maniac, and friend of the program, Ariel Helwani joins the show to chat about the Bills game against the Chiefs, how he's feeling, and what he expects from this weekend's fights at UFC 257 (56:48-1:27:17). To close out the show, Pat and AJ Hawk chat about this weekend's games and give their predictions (1:29:38-1:52:01). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
